channel.title: AcrasScape//new server, need staff and players!
channel.description:
Hey guys try out AcrasScape its a new server with great forums and in-game we need staff as well, feel free to join ! http://arcas.forumotion.com/ Minigames -pest control -barrows -barbarian assault -fight caves
Great bosses -king black dragon -godwars(coming soon) -Daggonoth king lair -ice queen/ ice wyverns
100% perfect switching 100% working barrows
And much more to come in the future.
We are a slightly new server looking for new players to join.
GREAT forums. Friendly staff/ community. http://arcas.forumotion.com/
